## Carry Recipe
_Jordan’s Back Carry – Base Size Minus 2 – Traditional Sling Pass + Cross Pass + Torso Pass_

- Traditional Sling Pass over baby on back
- Shoulder flip with under shoulder tail and across baby for a Cross Pass
- Under arm with other tail and Torso Pass over baby
- Tie in front
